title: STUMPED Partners with XForge for AI Speech Trainer Development
content:
🤝 STUMPED is excited to announce our technical partnership with XForge!

We're joining forces to develop an innovative speech practice platform featuring adversarial AI that challenges speakers in real-time. This collaboration will bring to life our vision of helping people master high-pressure speaking situations.

🎯 Development Focus:
• Web-based prototype
• Real-time AI interruptions
• Dynamic speech challenges
• Performance feedback system

XForge's technical expertise combined with STUMPED's vision will help ensure you're never caught off guard again. Stay tuned for development updates! 🚀
